metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4139 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An incorrect TLB flush issue was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s GPU i915kernel driver, potentially leading to random memory corruption or dataleaks. This flaw could allow a local user to crash the system or escalatetheir privileges on the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
